channel.title: computer vision on Vedang Lad
channel.description: Recent content in computer vision on Vedang Lad

item.title: Estimating label quality and errors in semantic segmentation data via any model
item.description: This paper proposes a novel method to find label errors in semantic segmentation datasets.

item.title: GRUNet: A Novel Bi-directional RNN for VQA
item.description: We propose a new framework which we call GRUNet. GRUNet is a novel Bi-Directional RNN architecture that combines GRU + RNN + ResNet to effectively combine text and im- age input to answer VQA questions.
